challenges.title: Frontend: Debounced Search Event Cleaner (AI Fix)
challenges.description:
AI-generated code attempt contains common mistake class: state mutation side effects. Fix the logic and produce correct output.
Collapse consecutive duplicate tokens (case-insensitive).
Constraints: O(n), preserve first casing in run.
Expected runtime envelope: accepted solutions should generally run below 2.5 seconds on baseline limits.

tests.name: case-1
tests.input: a a a b b c

tests.name: case-4
tests.input: up up down down down up

tests.name: case-6
tests.input: one two two three three three
